title: Staying Connected to God: A 60-Day Challenge (Part 2 of 2)
itunes:author: Guest: John Burke
itunes:summary:
John Burke reminds us that God is the source of life and of our contentment and joy. He gives us a clear picture of what it looks like to do life with God and how you can trust Him with your strongest and deepest desires. (Part 2 of 2)

Receive the book "Soul Revolution" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-06-21?refcd=1429710

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/staying-connected-to-god-a-60-day-challenge-part-2-of-2/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
